Package camsAction

package camsAction
  • Class
    Description
    doApproveSuggestion
    Interaction that represents the action of approving a suggestion.
    doDeleteAttendeeRegistration
    Interaction that represents the action of removing a user from a camp.
    doDeleteCamp
    Interaction that represents the action of deleting a camp from the database Effectively serves as a function pointer
    doDeleteEnquiry
    Interaction that represents the action of deleting an enquiry Effectively serves as a function pointer
    doDeleteSuggestion
    Interaction that represents the action of deleting a suggestion.
    doEditCampDetails
    Interaction that represents the action of changing the value of a single camp detail for a camp Effectively serves as a function pointer
    doEditEnquiry
    Interaction that represents the action of changing the contents of a submitted enquiry Effectively serves as a function pointer
    doEditSuggestion
    Interaction that represents the action of changing the contents of a submitted suggestion Effectively serves as a function pointer
    doNothing
    Interaction that represents the no action.
    doPrintStudentList
    Interaction that represents the action of generating and printing a camp report.
    doSubmitAttendeeRegistration
    Interaction that represents the action of adding a user to a camp as an attendee.
    doSubmitCamp
    Interaction that represents the creating and saving a camp into the database.
    doSubmitCommitteeRegistration
    Interaction that represents the action of adding a user to a camp as a camp committee member.
    doSubmitEnquiry
    Interaction that represents the action of creating and saving an enquiry regarding some camp, to the database.
    doSubmitReply
    Interaction that represents the action creating and saving a reply to some enquiry to the database.
    doSubmitSuggestion
    Interaction that represents the action of creating and saving a suggestion for some camp to the database.
    doToggleVisibility
    Interaction that represents the action of changing the visibility of a camp to a value other than its original value.
    GetData
    Class that contains the error handling wrappers for Data exclusive to camsAction Checks and throws the required exceptions as needed.
    MissingRequestedDataException
    Exception thrown when some Interaction does not have the requisite data it requires to carry out its action.
    ParseInput
    Contains the functions relating to string manipulation of user inputs that are exclusively used by camsAction.
    queryAllCampsMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of giving the user a list of camps to choose from, not filtered by any camp aspect.
    queryAllEnquiriesMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering the user a list of enquiries to choose from.
    queryAllSuggestionsMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of suggestions from a single camp to choose from.
    queryCampsFilteredMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of camps filtered by some predefined aspect(s).
    queryFilterCampByMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of aspects to filter camps by Effectively serves as a function pointer
    queryOwnCampsMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of the camps in their list to choose from.
    queryOwnEnquriesMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of enquiries on their list to choose from.
    queryOwnSuggestionsMenu
    Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of on their list suggestions to choose from.
